name: CVE-2022-3947
description: A vulnerability classified as critical has been found in eolinker goku_lite. This affects an unknown part of the file /balance/service/list. The manipulation of the argument route/keyword leads to sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-213453 was assigned to this vulnerability.

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
